headline: XME Rode Gold to a Near Double, Now Freeport’s Q2 Restart Will Test the Rally
summary: The SPDR S&P Metals & Mining ETF (NYSEARCA:XME) has nearly doubled over the past year, climbing from around $62 to $118, as investors pile into commodities exposed to electrification, defense, and monetary policy uncertainty. With top holdings like Newmont (NYSE:NEM), Freeport-McMoRan (NYSE:FCX), and Alcoa (NYSE:AA) combining for roughly 16% of the portfolio, XME functions as ... XME Rode Gold to a Near Double, Now Freeport’s Q2 Restart Will Test the Rally

headline: StrikePoint Gold Acquires Nevada's Past Producing Como Mining District from Newmont Mining Corporation
summary: Historical drillhole intercepts include CA-04, 12.19m of 5.00 g/t Au and CA-05, 21.34m of 2.02 g/t AuSurface samples up to 166.63 g/t Au and 61.80 g/t AgVancouver, British Columbia--(Newsfile Corp. - February 18, 2026) - StrikePoint Gold Inc. (TSXV: SKP) (OTCQB: STKXF) ("StrikePoint" or the "Company") is pleased to announce that it has entered into a definitive agreement to acquire certain unpatented mining claims in the past producing Como Mining District from Fronteer Development (USA) LLC, a.

headline: Walmart Earnings, GDP and Inflation Data: What to Watch This Week
